data.textUthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِى فَرَضَ عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لَرَآدُّكَ إِلَىٰ مَعَادٍ ۚ قُل رَّبِّىٓ أَعْلَمُ مَن جَآءَ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ وَمَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلَّذِى [He Who] فَرَضَ [ordained] عَلَيْكَ [upon you] ٱلْقُرْءَانَ [the Quran] لَرَآدُّكَ [(will) surely take you back] إِلَىٰ [to] مَعَادٍۢ ۚ [a place of return] قُل [Say] رَّبِّىٓ [My Lord] أَعْلَمُ [(is) most knowing] مَن [(of him) who] جَآءَ [comes] بِٱلْهُدَىٰ [with the guidance] وَمَنْ [and who ] هُوَ [he] فِى [(is) in] ضَلَـٰلٍۢ [an error] مُّبِينٍۢ [manifest]
data.transliteration: Inna allathee farada AAalaykaalqur-ana laradduka ila maAAadin qulrabbee aAAlamu man jaa bilhuda waman huwafee dalalin mubeen

data.textUthmani: وَمَا كُنتَ تَرْجُوٓا۟ أَن يُلْقَىٰٓ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ ظَهِيرًا لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And not] كُنتَ [you were] تَرْجُوٓا۟ [expecting] أَن [that] يُلْقَىٰٓ [would be sent down] إِلَيْكَ [to you] ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ [the Book] إِلَّا [except] رَحْمَةًۭ [(as) a mercy] مِّن [from] رَّبِّكَ ۖ [your Lord] فَلَا [So (do) not] تَكُونَنَّ [be] ظَهِيرًۭا [an assistant] لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ [to the disbelievers]
data.transliteration: Wama kunta tarjoo an yulqailayka alkitabu illa rahmatan min rabbikafala takoonanna thaheeran lilkafireen

data.textUthmani: وَلَا يَصُدُّنَّكَ عَنْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ بَعْدَ إِذْ أُنزِلَتْ إِلَيْكَ ۖ وَٱدْعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ۖ وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَا [And (let) not] يَصُدُّنَّكَ [avert you] عَنْ [from] ءَايَـٰتِ [(the) Verses] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] بَعْدَ [after] إِذْ [[when]] أُنزِلَتْ [they have been revealed] إِلَيْكَ ۖ [to you] وَٱدْعُ [And invite (people)] إِلَىٰ [to] رَبِّكَ ۖ [your Lord] وَلَا [And (do) not] تَكُونَنَّ [be] مِنَ [of] ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ [the polytheists]
data.transliteration: Wala yasuddunnaka AAan ayatiAllahi baAAda ith onzilat ilayka wadAAu ilarabbika wala takoonanna mina almushrikeen

data.textUthmani: وَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۘ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ كُلُّ شَىْءٍ هَالِكٌ إِلَّا وَجْهَهُۥ ۚ لَهُ ٱلْحُكْمُ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَا [And (do) not] تَدْعُ [invoke] مَعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] إِلَـٰهًا [god] ءَاخَرَ ۘ [other] لَآ [(There is) no] إِلَـٰهَ [god] إِلَّا [except] هُوَ ۚ [Him] كُلُّ [Every] شَىْءٍ [thing] هَالِكٌ [(will be) destroyed] إِلَّا [except] وَجْهَهُۥ ۚ [His Face] لَهُ [To Him] ٱلْحُكْمُ [(is) the Decision] وَإِلَيْهِ [and to Him] تُرْجَعُونَ [you will be returned]
data.transliteration: Wala tadAAu maAAa Allahi ilahanakhara la ilaha illa huwa kullushay-in halikun illa wajhahu lahu alhukmuwa-ilayhi turjaAAoon

data.textUthmani: أَحَسِبَ ٱلنَّاسُ أَن يُتْرَكُوٓا۟ أَن يَقُولُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا وَهُمْ لَا يُفْتَنُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَحَسِبَ [Do think] ٱلنَّاسُ [the people] أَن [that] يُتْرَكُوٓا۟ [they will be left] أَن [because] يَقُولُوٓا۟ [they say] ءَامَنَّا [We believe] وَهُمْ [and they] لَا [will not be tested] يُفْتَنُونَ [will not be tested]
data.transliteration: Ahasiba annasu anyutrakoo an yaqooloo amanna wahum layuftanoon

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۖ فَلَيَعْلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا۟ وَلَيَعْلَمَنَّ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And indeed] فَتَنَّا [We tested] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] مِن [(were) before them] قَبْلِهِمْ ۖ [(were) before them] فَلَيَعْلَمَنَّ [And Allah will surely make evident] ٱللَّهُ [And Allah will surely make evident] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] صَدَقُوا۟ [(are) truthful] وَلَيَعْلَمَنَّ [and He will surely make evident] ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ [the liars]
data.transliteration: Walaqad fatanna allatheena minqablihim falayaAAlamanna Allahu allatheena sadaqoowalayaAAlamanna alkathibeen

words.translation: And Allah will surely make evident
And Allah will surely make evident
and He will surely make evident

data.textUthmani: أَمْ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن يَسْبِقُونَا ۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحْكُمُونَ
data.wordByWord: أَمْ [Or] حَسِبَ [think] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] يَعْمَلُونَ [do] ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ [evil deeds] أَن [that] يَسْبِقُونَا ۚ [they can outrun Us] سَآءَ [Evil is] مَا [what] يَحْكُمُونَ [they judge]
data.transliteration: Am hasiba allatheenayaAAmaloona assayyi-ati an yasbiqoona saama yahkumoon

data.textUthmani: مَن كَانَ يَرْجُوا۟ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَـَٔاتٍ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
data.wordByWord: مَن [Whoever] كَانَ [[is]] يَرْجُوا۟ [hopes] لِقَآءَ [(for the) meeting] ٱللَّهِ [(with) Allah] فَإِنَّ [then indeed] أَجَلَ [(the) Term] ٱللَّهِ [(of) Allah] لَـَٔاتٍۢ ۚ [(is) surely coming] وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلسَّمِيعُ [(is) the All-Hearer] ٱلْعَلِيمُ [the All-Knower]
data.transliteration: Man kana yarjoo liqaa Allahifa-inna ajala Allahi laatin wahuwa assameeAAualAAaleem

data.textUthmani: وَمَن جَـٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَـٰهِدُ لِنَفْسِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِىٌّ عَنِ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَمَن [And whoever] جَـٰهَدَ [strives] فَإِنَّمَا [then only] يُجَـٰهِدُ [he strives] لِنَفْسِهِۦٓ ۚ [for himself] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] لَغَنِىٌّ [(is) Free from need] عَنِ [of] ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ [the worlds]
data.transliteration: Waman jahada fa-innama yujahidulinafsihi inna Allaha laghaniyyun AAani alAAalameen
